font.span: A few updates from the ODE/ODHE and from BGSU as it pertains to College Credit Plus: Click here for the CCP document released by the State on Friday. Additional BGSU information can be accessed by clicking "Read More".

span.span: Anyone going into 8th-12th grade next year can now sign up for Mustang silks until May 5th. To sign up message Ms. Titus or Shelby Ruth at

span.style: caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: medium; font-style: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -moz-text-size-adjust: auto; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration: none; display: inline !important; float: none;

span.span: Kindergarten registration for the 2020-2021 school year has been postponed. Please fill out this form to pre-register. Click here for the required documents. Please see the letter from Mr. Rentschler.

div.style: font-family: "wf_segoe-ui_normal", "Segoe UI", "Segoe WP", Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif, serif, "EmojiFont";

font.face: Calibri,Helvetica,sans-serif,EmojiFont,Apple Color Emoji,Segoe UI Emoji,NotoColorEmoji,Segoe UI Symbol,Android Emoji,EmojiSymbols
font.span: An informational letter will be sent to you in regards to screening dates and will also include a postage paid envelope to mail back the "initial" documents for office verification.

span.span: Children must be five years of age on or before August 1, 2020. If you have any questions, contact the Allen East Elementary Office at 419-648-3333 ext. 1004.

p.span: see the packet pickup information from Mr. Rentschler. We are putting procedures in place to ensure social distancing. The hours for packet drop off and pick up have been to 7:00-10:00 a.m. and 4:00-7:00 p.m. Monday, April 6 and Tuesday, April 7.

span.style: caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: -webkit-standard; font-size: medium; font-style: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -moz-text-size-adjust: auto; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration: none; display: inline !important; float: none;

span.span: The Athletic Department 5K run has been rescheduled for Saturday, June 27. If you were registered for the March race that was postponed, you are still registered and do not need to submit anything more. Click here for the flyer to register and for more information.

span.span: Allen East wants to support our families during the world-wide pandemic. With the economic downturn, a number of families may now qualify for free and reduced lunches who have never qualified in the past. Please fill out the

span.style: caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; font-size: 14.666666984558105px; font-style: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: auto; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: auto; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration: none; display: inline !important; float: none;

caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; font-size: 14.6667px; font-style: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -moz-text-size-adjust: auto; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration: none; display: inline !important; float: none;

span.span: . As part of the free/reduced lunch program, fees are waived for anyone who qualifies and meals are provided during the crisis to children who qualify.

div.a: Read More about Free and Reduced Lunch Program

img.a: Update on Free and Reduced Lunch

p.span: Following the stay-at-home order from Governor DeWine, our school offices will no longer be open to the public as our staff are remaining safe at home. We will continue to offer sacked lunches for those who qualify for free or reduced lunches that have been signed up for the lunches. If you have not been contacted and qualify for free or reduced lunches, please call Vera Vernell at (419) 648-3333 ext 1505 and leave a voicemail. She will be checking these voicemails and making adjustments to the list of who will be able to pickup lunches. The lunch pick up times will continue to be on Wednesdays from 10:30am - 12:30pm and 3:00pm - 5:00pm.

strong.span: The lunch pick-up for April 15, 2020 will be from 10:30 a.m. until 12:30 p.m. There will not be pick-up from 3:00-5:00 p.m.

div.a: Read More about Update on Free and Reduced Lunch
